name.namePart: Lindquist, G. E. E. (Gustavus Elmer Emanuel), 1886-1967
Lindquist, G. E. E. (Gustavus Elmer Emanuel), 1886-1967

titleInfo.title: Death Valley National Monument, The Devil's Golf Course, California

mods.abstract: Recto annotation: Death Valley National Monument, California. The Devil's Golf Course.

Verso annotation: The Devil's Golf Course and Telescope Peak. were Nature has wrought rock and salt into bizarre combinations. Death Valley, California. (9/16/38) Dear Helen: How are you? Have just emmerged from Death Valley and was it ever hot!! Just like a furnace. We saw some interesting formations - and now visiting group of Indians around Bishop, California. Much love, Dad. (Helen Lindquist; 7 Winona St., Laurence, Kan.)

location.physicalLocation: The Burke Library (Columbia University Libraries) at Union Theological Seminary in the City of New York
